page.title: 14Lothingland Pupil Activities
page.content:
After school the children take part in many different activities.
Here are some of the activities that the boys take part in: We like playing on the computer,going to amusement arcades to play on the video machines, playing football and tennis, watching T.V., swimming and sometimes we go fishing on the Broads. Some of us go to organizations and clubs, such as the Scouts or bird- watching.
Here are some of the activities that the girls take part in: Playing records, going to Youth Club, and visiting friends. The organizations the girls belong to are Lowestoft Swimming and Diving Club, Judo, squash and badminton clubs.
